committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy

official_title: To provide for pay parity for civilian employees serving at joint military installations.
short_title: BRAC Wage Locality Pay Parity Act of 2011
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: BRAC Wage Locality Pay Parity Act of 2011 - Requires that all civilian employees of military installations which are not located within the same pay locality and which are reorganized or associated as a single joint installation receive uniform locality pay at the percentage payable with respect to the locality then receiving the highest locality pay.

titles.title: BRAC Wage Locality Pay Parity Act of 2011
To provide for pay parity for civilian employees serving at joint military installations.
